title: *ping ping ping ping ping ping* "GTFO MY LANE"
body:
....You're dead and I'm freezing the lane for you.

You might not understand what I'm doing, but it's called last hitting. You're not losing out on any CS, and the lane is not being pushed.

In short, I'm demonstrating basic laning mechanics for you because you clearly don't understand them, and that's why you're waiting to respawn. Take notes and shut up.
